Typography

Demonstration of our Particle Typography.

To override the default font values, you can do so using the theme.fontFamily theme.fontWeight, theme.fontSize sections of your tailwind.config.js file.

Tailwind Documentation

Font Family

CSS Property: font-family
Utility Class Properties Demo
font-sans Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica Arial, sans-serif Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam

font-mono Source Code Pro, Courier New, monospace Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam
font-utcbody Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam
font-utcheadings Exo, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam

Font Weight

CSS Property: font-weight
Utility Class Properties
font-thin 100
font-extralight 200
font-light 300
font-normal 400
font-medium 500
font-semibold 600
font-bold 700
font-extrabold 800
font-black 900
